title: Emphasize no TODOs rule in AGENTS.md
description: Make it more clear and prominent that agents should never use TODO comments or markdown TODO lists

title: Initialize local beads database for AGENTS repo
description: Create a repository-specific beads database instead of using the global one

title: Add bd onboard instruction and reconcile with existing docs
description: Add 'BEFORE ANYTHING ELSE: run bd onboard' instruction to AGENTS.md and ensure onboarding flow aligns with existing Rule 2 documentation

title: Fix incorrect --no-db flag usage in AGENTS.md
description: Remove --no-db flags from examples and use proper default mode with --json for programmatic output. Then investigate SQLite database compatibility issues.

title: Add AGENTS.md reference to session handoff prompt
description: Update Landing the Plane section to include 'please read and apply ../AGENTS/AGENTS.md' in recommended next session prompt

title: Add MIT License to repository
description: Create LICENSE file with MIT License for AGENTS.md and repository

title: Add rule about using latest dependency versions
description: Add statement to AGENTS.md about preferring latest versions when adding new dependencies

title: Emphasize never commit directly to main
description: Add stronger emphasis that ALL changes must go through branch and PR flow, never commit directly to main even for small changes

title: Update landing protocol to commit beads changes to active PR
description: Clarify that beads database updates should be committed and pushed to the working PR, not left uncommitted

title: Add exponential backoff monitoring rule to AGENTS.md
description: Add Rule 7 documenting exponential backoff strategy for monitoring long-running processes

title: Add 'Landing the Plane' protocol to AGENTS.md
description: Incorporate the session-ending protocol from beads/AGENTS.md to ensure clean handoffs between sessions

title: Add rule to keep documentation in README.md
description: Add rule specifying that all project documentation should be in README.md rather than creating separate documentation files

title: Update beads init rule to verify correct database location
description: Add instructions to PR #1 about checking which beads database is active and ensuring local database is used

title: Add rule for beads database initialization
description: Add rule to AGENTS.md specifying that agents should initialize a beads database if one doesn't exist in the repository

title: Initialize git repo and push to GitHub
description: Initialize AGENTS directory as git repository, create GitHub repo, and push initial commit with AGENTS.md

title: Fix beads database configuration by adding issue-prefix
description: The beads database was missing the required issue-prefix config, preventing all bd commands from working. Fixed by adding 'issue-prefix: AGENTS' to config.yaml and reinitializing the database.

title: Add git-worktree guidance for parallel agent work
description: Document that agents working in parallel should use separate git-worktrees for isolation
